ygData.subject: RE: Char Catillion
ygData.msgSnippet: I never got Name looks friendly I get You feel an aura of enchantment wash over you and the NPC glows. Then, you /con the NPC, and he should view you
ygData.messageBody:
I never got "Name looks friendly"

I get "You feel an aura of enchantment wash over you" and the NPC glows.

Then, you /con the NPC, and he should view you better.



Target the NPC you want to affect. Play the song. Wait until it gives you a

message that it has actually affected the person (NOT when the song goes

off. You'll get something like Name looks friendly)



>-----Original Message-----

>From: Papa Legba [mailto:legba@...]

>Sent: Friday, January 07, 2000 7:33 AM

>To: eqbards@onelist.com

>Subject: [eqbards] Char Catillion

>

>

>Or whatever the low lvl charisma song is.

>

>How do you use it? I cannot get it to work...
